author: Ryan Daws
description:
Meta is challenging the EU’s ruling that its ad-supported model does not comply with the Digital Markets Act (DMA). The tech giant claims the decision is both “incorrect and unlawful” and disregards a previous ruling from the EU’s highest court. In April, the European Commission concluded that Meta’s offering to European users – which allows... Read more »

The post Meta slams ‘incorrect and unlawful’ EU DMA ruling appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Meta slams ‘incorrect and unlawful’ EU DMA ruling
